description:
Windows: net, syscall: implement SetsockoptIPMReq(), move to winsock v2.2 for multicast support.
I don't know the protocol regarding the zsyscall files which appear to
be hand-generated, so I've re-done them and added them to the change.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM. Please compete http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright, and I will submit. Thank you.

Alex

I submitted the individual copyright holder form some days (2 weeks?) ago; I can do it again if necessary.
Paul

Sent from my iPad

On 2011-09-07, at 21:28, alex.brainman@gmail.com wrote:

> LGTM. Please compete http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright,
> and I will submit. Thank you.
> 
> Alex
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/4975060/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=56c50c2e16e5 ***

Windows: net, syscall: implement SetsockoptIPMReq(), move to winsock v2.2 for multicast support.
I don't know the protocol regarding the zsyscall files which appear to
be hand-generated, so I've re-done them and added them to the change.

R=rsc, alex.brainman, nigeltao
CC=golang-dev
